snippet: The company increased its 2014 earnings forecast for a third time, driven in part by revenue gains from its new hepatitis C treatment Olysio.
abstract: Johnson & Johnson increases its 2014 earnings forecast for a third time, driven in part by revenue gains from its new hepatitis C treatment Olysio; expects earnings to range from $5.92 to $5.97 a share.
lead_paragraph: The company increased its 2014 earnings forecast for a third time, driven in part by revenue gains from its new hepatitis C treatment Olysio.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson Raises 2014 Earnings Forecast Again
headline.print_headline: Johnson & Johnson Raises 2014 Earnings Forecast Again
